function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integrated data infrastructure leading to difficulty in data collection and sharing","Impact":"Ineffective response to outbreaks due to lack of essential data","Mitigation":"Implement open data policies, develop cooperation among MDAs, and build integrated data infrastructure","Technologies":"Data management and integration technologies","People":"Government agencies, research institutions","Owner":"Government, research institutions"},{"Description":"Data poverty and poor data leading to inadequate response and perpetuating inequality","Impact":"Inability to address vulnerable populations and perpetuation of inequality","Mitigation":"Adopt open data policies, enhance data collection for vulnerable populations, and promote data equity","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, open data platforms","People":"Vulnerable populations, public health professionals","Owner":"Government, public health institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate supply chain resilience leading to disruption in essential supplies","Impact":"Difficulty in managing outbreaks and emergencies due to supply chain disruptions","Mitigation":"Build resilient supply chain networks, implement circular economy principles, and improve supply chain logistics","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, circular economy technologies","People":"Healthcare providers, emergency responders","Owner":"Supply chain management entities, government"}]}
